attributes.action: Make the public more away of the dangers of nerdaholism.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nerdaholism is more dangerous than crack and heroin put together. Yet is there a www.nerdaware.com site? I think not! The government has tried to brush this horrific problem under the carpet for too long. Let us not forget the affects that nerdaholism had back in 2005! 

Protect our children from this ravaging illness. Please Gordy, do something!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
